question.text: You want to reverse into a side road. You are not sure that the area behind your car is clear. What should you do?

explanation.text: If you cannot be sure whether there is anything behind you, it is always safest to check before reversing. There may be a small child or a low obstruction close behind your car. The shape and size of your vehicle can restrict visibility.

answer.text: Look through the rear window only
Carry on, assuming it is clear
